Definition * defRef
 Reference to definition of declared entity.

Detailed Description

Constructs that delare entities without defining them.

C++

  • example: 
     1| int foo();  // defRef = definition begining on line 11, identifierName = "foo", type = "int"
 2| 
  | ...
10| 
11| int foo()
12| {
  |     ...
21| }
